data.text: @CatholicLeague So Billy - you follow an authoritarian Pope and Church with strict rules - but when a government enforces law and order you claim Civil Rights are violated.  Which is it?  You’re really losing it Bill. @twitter - more lies, fake news, and disinformation. You’re move.
@CatholicLeague Hey Bill, the Church is on the side of the Ukraine.  Why aren't you? https://t.co/DHzOUB7Bcz

@CatholicLeague Why is Bill Donohue on the side of rich Russian billionaire oligarchs?  Why does he not condemn the murder of innocent people in the Ukraine?  Why is Bill Donohue a proponent of fascism? Who owns Bill Donohue for $1 million dollars a year? Bannon?

@CatholicLeague Bill Donohue continues his refusal to condemn Russia's fascist attack on Ukraine then goes on to defend the fascists who want to overthrow Canadian rule. Bill Donohue's rants are proof he is anti-American, anti-Democracy and anti-Christian. The Catholic Church's version of Putin.
@CatholicLeague Please cite the Biblical verse to which you are referring.

@CatholicLeague Your opinion may be valid. He does have a moral right to do so. The Church no longer lives in sixteen century where it can dictate the policies of the State.  Your opinion is just that.
